tagline: Brunch creativ, gustus & halal — mintga di.

meta.description: URBAN BRUNCH serva ideas da brunch creativas, halal e responsablas a Neuchâtel.

hero.description: Cuschina stagionala, zero spretsch e vibraziuns soul.

gallery.title: Muments da gust
gallery.description: Impressiuns or da la cuschina e sala.

newsletter.title: Restar inspirà
newsletter.description: Recuva novas creaziuns, occurrenzas e ofertas.

form.title: Scriva nus
form.name: Num
form.error: Ina errur è capitada. Emprova p.pl. anc ina giada.

reservation.title: Reservar ina maisa
reservation.description: Planisescha il brunch ideal cun paucas cliccas.

about.title: Noss concept
about.mission: URBAN BRUNCH cumbinescha inspiraziuns street-food cun tradiziuns svizras. Nus preferin products locals e cuschina 100% halal.
about.sustainability: Mintga emna reinventain nus las recetas per reducir spretsch e dar ils surpliens ad uniuns localas.

urbanSoul.title: Urban Soul
urbanSoul.description: Croissant smash cun bov, ov crudà, succus detox.

medinaMorning.title: Medina Morning
medinaMorning.description: Waffle cun giaglina spetada lev, hummus d'argan, tè da menta fraid.

alpineGlow.title: Alpine Glow
alpineGlow.description: Pancakes maple & pecan, skyr, latte cun cardamom.

legal.title: Infurmaziuns legalas
legal.content: Quest sit è in project da demonstraziun. Tut ils cuntegns èn be d'exempel.
